alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 10:20AM MST until January 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from 3 to 6 inches with 12 inches or more above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph with locally reduced visibilities in blowing snow. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands and Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Check road conditions before heading out.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
